summary:
I love finding new innovative ways to solve complex business problems through modern technology. To accomplish this, I focus on customer centricity, building amazing teams, and taking a straight line to commercial value.

I have enjoyed many IT leadership positions throughout my career in product management, project delivery, and strategy. My personal and professional experiences have taught me the following about myself:

I can successfully create, scale and optimize software product portfolios that meet customer needs
	- I put the customer at the center of all that I do
	- I excel at the execution of big ideas with given constraints
	- I enjoy building lasting partnerships with senior business stakeholders

I can align, lead and grow world-class product teams 
	- I love to win, but helping the team win gives me greater joy
	- I speak tech and exec
	- I help people to be the best version of themselves 

I educate, refine and drive myself to be a better person
	- I stay calm and resilient when faced with adversity
	- I embrace a learner mindset
	- I focus on making data-driven decisions
	
Professional Skills
Strategic Planning | Product Management | Agile Development | Business Partnering | Portfolio Strategy | SaaS | Team Development 

Domain Knowledge
Finance Planning & Analysis | Business Performance Management | Energy | Real-time Data | Advanced Analytics

profile_positions.description:
•	Working within Shell’s Downstream IT organisation, I develop strategic sustainability partnerships and drive digital innovation with Shell’s largest customers and suppliers, including some of the world’s largest tech sector companies.
•	Work with ecosystem partners to identify and mature new business development opportunities and customer value propositions related to sustainability and decarbonisation, that generate commercial and reputational value for Shell and our partners.
•	Own, co-create, and evergreen the IT strategic plan for the Enterprise Accounts business portfolio.
•	Shape and guide technology investment decision-making through strategic alliances, aligning choices to defined business priorities or challenges.
•	Drive technology adoption for deeper customer penetration and competitive differentiation.
profile_positions.title: Information and Digital Technology Manager - Enterprise Accounts

profile_positions.description:
•	Head of IT for the Finance function that supports Shell’s Upstream, Integrated Gas, and Projects & Technology businesses. 
•	Tasked with shaping the IT strategy and roadmap, and driving digital transformation across Finance & EPM work processes and legacy IT systems, reducing operating costs, modernizing the IT portfolio, and delivering a better all-round user experience.
•	Managed team of 12 direct reports with over 30 team members, and a complex IT portfolio which included 10+ business critical applications and most-confidential data.
profile_positions.title: IT Manager - Enterprise Performance Management & Finance

profile_positions.description:
•	Headed the development of a global production surveillance product for Shell’s Upstream and Integrated Gas business units, using big data platforms (SAP HANA), advanced analytics tools (OSISoft PI), and business intelligence solutions (Spotfire).
•	Managed a scaled Agile scrum team consisting of 15 staff and contractors, including a scrum master, front-end, back-end developers, UX designers, and QA testers.
•	Championed the product through regular engagements with stakeholders, showcasing the key functionalities, driving product adoption and assuring operational excellence together with IT peers.
•	Liaise with various stakeholders on requirements to ensure the “Why” and the “What” are specified so that the scrum team can work on the “How”.
•	Shaped the mid to long-term vision, roadmap, and backlog for the product, prioritizing working according to value for customers. 
•	Managed the annual investment budget and delivered more than $20M in net present value by enabling early intervention on production issues and opportunities.
•	Successfully transitioned scrum team from Netherlands to the strategic IT hub in Bangalore, lowering the operating cost by more than 50%, without impacting product delivery.
•	Mentored 2 product owners who were part of the integrated delivery team.
profile_positions.title: Chief Product Owner - Production Surveillance & Optimization

profile_positions.description:
•	Lead a small team of functional experts in developing integration and reporting solutions that provide production support teams with real-time insights into operational performance and safety.
•	Lead the execution of IT projects throughout the project lifecycle, using scrum/agile, or waterfall (where needed) methodology.
•	Handled all project management activities in terms of scope, quality, time, cost, information, and organization (governance).
•	Technologies used include VB.Net, VBA, ASP.Net MVC, JavaScript, jQuery, SQL, OSISoft PI
profile_positions.title: IT Project Manager

profile_positions.description:
•	Part of a team responsible for IT projects that help to improve the safety and efficiency of production operations by helping teams generating quicker insights and actions from real-time operations data.
•	Lead the architecture design and installation of the real-time data historian, including the setup of high-availability, archiving, and interfaces with other corporate business applications.  
•	Developed an analytics engine for automated the calculation and reporting of harmful emissions generated from operations, which were submitted to the Russian government.
•	Act as functional support lead for full application portfolio (20+ applications)
•	Technologies used include VB.Net, VBA, SQL Server Reporting Services, SQL Server, OSISoft PI
profile_positions.title: Senior Software Engineer

profile_positions.description:
•	Part of a team that developed software integration solutions for manufacturing companies, connecting data from the plant to the business domain.
•	Provided user requirements analysis, design and programming support for systems integration and reporting projects in PetroSA.
•	Successfully migrated the corporate database from Oracle to SQL Server for the British America Tobacco Cape Town office.
•	Technologies used include C#, VBA, Oracle, SQL Server.
profile_positions.title: Software Engineer
